text: UMvelinqangi akekho umuntu amenzela izinhliziyo ezimbili ngaphakathi kuyena futhi akazange enze amakhosikazi enu lawoenenzaisehlukanisonawongokuthinithi(enithi) imihlane yawo injengeyomama benu ukuthi angomama benu futhi akazange enze amadodana enu eniwatholile (lawo angenabo abazali) ukuthi angamadodana enu, lokho yinkulumo yenu eniyisho ngemilomo yenu futhi uMvelinqangi ukhuluma iqiniso futhi yena uholela endleleni (eqondile)
